episode_event_glasses_2022/4001_1001_010: Argh, they beat us! Let’s get outta here!
episode_event_glasses_2022/4001_1001_030:
And we got your glasses back! Be careful not to
lose them again!
episode_event_glasses_2022/4001_1001_040: Grrr! What’s up with those jerks?
episode_event_glasses_2022/4001_1001_050: They certainly did a number on us...
episode_event_glasses_2022/4001_1001_070:
Yes! How did you know? The frames are exactly
the same as my old ones.
episode_event_glasses_2022/4001_1001_080:
You know what they say: “If it ain’t broke, don’t
fix it!”
episode_event_glasses_2022/4001_1001_090:
Oh no! More of them? And this time it’s Elite Four
members, Gym Leaders, and a Castle Valet?
episode_event_glasses_2022/4001_1001_100:
Wh-what should we do? They’ve all got on
glasses or sunglasses!
episode_event_glasses_2022/4001_1001_110: Let’s scram before they find us!
episode_event_glasses_2022/4002_1001_020: Hmm? Well, if it isn’t Team Break.
episode_event_glasses_2022/4002_1001_040:
What’s that you say? You’re in awe of my
magnificent Mega Glasses? It appears you
have very good taste.
episode_event_glasses_2022/4002_1001_050:
Allow me to explain the cutting-edge science used
to create this ingenious design—
episode_event_glasses_2022/4002_1001_070:
What is going on?! Why does everyone we run
into have on glasses or sunglasses?
episode_event_glasses_2022/4002_1001_080:
Wow, Roark! You sure do take good care of
your glasses!
episode_event_glasses_2022/4002_1001_100:
That’s right! I’d say my glasses are like an
invaluable partner to me.
episode_event_glasses_2022/4002_1001_110:
Without them, I wouldn’t be able to dig holes or
find fossils!
episode_event_glasses_2022/4002_1001_120: I know exactly how you feel.
episode_event_glasses_2022/4002_1001_130:
Wait, what?! How could Steven possibly
understand? He doesn’t wear glasses
or sunglasses!
episode_event_glasses_2022/4002_1001_140:
No, you’re forgetting something... Remember what
he was wearing in the summer?
episode_event_glasses_2022/4004_1001_020:
We’ve got to get out of here! There’s no way we
can take on a Champion!
episode_event_glasses_2022/4004_1001_030: My legs can’t take any more running...
episode_event_glasses_2022/4005_1001_040: I’ve heard all about your nefarious scheme.
episode_event_glasses_2022/4005_1001_060:
You chose the wrong type of Trainers on this
island to mess with!
episode_event_glasses_2022/4005_1001_070:
I think you’re right. *sigh*
Figures we’d run into you three.
episode_event_glasses_2022/4005_1001_080:
It looks like we’ll have to give up on our plan to
make everyone wear masks.
episode_event_glasses_2022/4005_1001_090:
I never would have guessed that people on Pasio
love their glasses and sunglasses this much...
